p: The drug-like properties of docked compounds were determined based on Lipinski's rule of five [ 52]. As per the rule, acceptable physicochemical parameters of a compound include molecular weight ≤500, H-bond acceptor ≤10, H-bond donor ≤5, log P ≤ 5 and molar refractivity 40–130. Prediction of ADME characteristics of identified constituents from Bischofia javanica was carried out using QikProp module of Schrödinger maestro (v11.1). Furthermore, toxicity profiles including hepatotoxicity, carcinogenicity, immunotoxicity and mutagenicity of the selected compounds were evaluated using ProTox server (tox.charite.de/protox_II).
